review: GRADE : B+ THIS FILM IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED .

title: Just Super
review: IN BRIEF : A delightful animated romp with superheroes who save the day .

title: Just Super
review: JIM"S REVIEW : Incredibles 2 , writer /director Brad Bird"s sequel to his original 2004 film , continues with the right 60"s retro vibe from its op and pop art settings , its endearing family of superheroes , and its way - too - cool jazz - infused score by Michael Giacchino .

title: Just Super
review: Yes , it was a long wait for its return

title: Just Super
review: and the film delivers in its artistry and savvy animation .

title: Just Super
review: The plot : It is now illegal to be a superhero .

title: Just Super
review: This law includes The Parr clan : Bob a. K. A. Mr. Incredible ( Craig T. Nelson ) and Helen a. K. A. Elastigirl ( Holly Hunter ) are in hiding and living in a cheap motel , along with their gifted children , moody teenage Violet ( Sarah Vowell ) , Dash ( Huck Milner ) and Baby Jack - Jack ( Eli Fucile ) .

title: Just Super
review: Soon they are called upon to legitimize their powers once again , this time by a rich businessman , Winston Deavor ( Bob Odenkirk ) )

title: Just Super
review: and his inventor sister ( Catherine Keener ) who will finance their reappearance .

title: Just Super
review: They decide to re - package and sell our crusaders to the American public , including their buddy , Frozone ( Samuel L. Jackson ) , and start their campaign by making Elastigirl the main focus of admiration .

title: Just Super
review: This shifts the family dynamics by having Mr. Incredible become a stay - at - home dad who morphs into Mr. Mom with harried results , especially since Baby Jack Jack begins to develop his own lethal super powers .

title: Just Super
review: Mr. Bird does a masterful job directing the film .

title: Just Super
review: His unmistakeable visual look of his film with its dated futuristic viewpoint is stylized pop via George Jetson .

title: Just Super
review: Script - wise , his characters " dialog is sharply written too , even if his story does meander , spending too much time with exposition about the arch villain , ScreenSlaver , and the introduction of other superheroes that barely register in personality or interest .

title: Just Super
review: Their only purpose is to somewhat complicate the plot and allow for more action scenes .

title: Just Super
review: But there is enough wit and humor throughout the movie to sustain the pure joy of gorgeously rendered chase sequences of dare - doings that flow with wonderful movement and clever details .

title: Just Super
review: However , some wonderful minor characters are given short rift in this installment due to the narrative .

title: Just Super
review: One wishes the likes of Rick Dicker ( Jonathan Banks ) , Underminer ( John Ratzenberger ) , and especially Edith Head look - alike Edna Mode ( the multi - talented Mr. Bird himself ) had more screen time .

title: Just Super
review: If the film had devoted more expansion of those unique figures and less on other newly introduced ones , the film would have been all the more memorable .

title: Just Super
review: ( Personally , the two highlights for me were not the many chase sequences , though they are so well edited

title: Just Super
review: and excitingly staged .

title: Just Super
review: No , it was the quieter ones that involved Baby Jack Jack and a feisty raccoon and a truly comic scene with Miss Edna , of course ! ) Just as the colorful animation is outstanding , so is the voiceover work .

title: Just Super
review: Special kudos go out to to Mr. Nelson , Ms. Hunter , Mr. Banks , and the director for their vocal skills .

title: Just Super
review: All of the actors do a tremendous job of imbuing the characters so well , Particularly impressive is Mr. Nelson"s sleep - deprived fatherly tirade moment which is a perfect blending of voice and animation .

title: Just Super
review: Always highly entertaining , Incredibles 2 is a worthy successor in the series .

title: Just Super
review: It is a movie filled with much whimsy and one can only delight at all the mischief and antics on display and be in constant awe of the artistic talent emanating from Mr. Bird and the Pixar Studios .

title: Just Super
review: NOTE : On a deeper level , this family film says a great deal about our polarized nation and I wouldn"t be surprised if there is a conservative outcry about Hollywood"s bias and that darn liberal agenda .

title: Just Super
review: But putting that bi - partisanship aside , the movie proudly celebrates the importance of family and the need to accept our differences and our individual multicultural talents .

title: Just Super
review: Politically speaking , the film"s subtle message of unity is so apropos in these troubling times when we can use a courageous superhero ( or ethical lawmaker ) to change our world and speak out against injustice .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: After 14 years of waiting , the long awaited sequel to The Incredibles has finally hit theaters nationwide .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: The main reason it came out much later than expected is mainly due to director Brad Bird and the Pixar team not really knowing the proper continuing story until later on .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: So now that it"s officially out , while I don"t put it nearly on the same level as the first film , I was quite satisfied with what we ended up getting nonetheless .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: Set immediately after the events of its predecessor , the story of Incredibles 2 centers around two particular plots : Helen Parr ( a. K. A. Elastigirl ) taking on superhero action undercover while Bob Parr ( a. K. A. Mr. Incredible ) watches over the family .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: Both plots work quite well in continuing the Parr"s arches in attempting to return as superheroes .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: Rather than being a simple case of role reversal , the main plot further stretches the elastic heroine to gain more momentum , especially with her main goal being to catch the menacing Screenslayer .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: As for Bob"s arch , he develops as both a father and role model by watching over the kids , while discovering more to his and their individual personalities .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: With baby Jack - Jack"s powers going all over the place , this creates many fun sequences of his various abilities that later attribute more to the story as it progresses .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: Even Violet"s arch consisting of boy troubles helps expand her character and to teach Mr. Incredible something new about her .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: The first film"s thematic elements of brilliant people not to be forced to conform to societal norms continues here , especially with telecommunications tycoon Winston Deavor trying to bring supers back in the spotlight again .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: In addition , there"s some neat commentary on Elastigirl being seen by herself as the current face of superheroes .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: The only main issue with the story is how some of the first film"s story beats are reused , I mean does Elastigirl fighting crime to support the family remind you of anything ? Also , despite being threatening , let"s just say that the new villain Screenslayer isn"t quite as memorable as Syndrome in The Incredibles , with a reveal that might be more predictable than assumed .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: Thankfully , most call - backs are very far and few in between , as Brad Bird presents new ideas that we never saw him unfold before .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: As for the new characters , they range from humorous enough to rather iffy .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: The most prominent ones featured have to be the Deavors , with the aforementioned Winston being a very competent businessman who desires returning supers to their formal glory along with his technological genius sister Evelyn who always fixes a dilemma when needed .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: The new supers that come by mainly stick out from their designs and distinct abilities , although Void does come off as a rather awkward fan of Elastigirl .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: While they don"t become very intriguing until later on , which I certainly can"t go into without spoiling much , the rest of the family still showcase their memorable love for each other and their individual powers .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: With a 14 year time span , it"s no wonder the animation got a significant upgrade compared to its predecessor .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: For one thing , not only did the characters get a significant redesign ,

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: but there is much detail displayed on their bodies and clothes to make them look more polished .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: Also , the set - pieces take full advantage of the battles the Incredibles " and other supers get into , complete with much more varieties of extravagant powers .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: The action sequences display even more wonderful and smooth choreography , particularly when it comes to Elastigirl showcasing her rubbery limbs .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: The real scene stealer has to be the multiple powers that Jack - Jack creates , as they astonish the viewers as much as make them chuckle .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: Similar to the first film , the modernist 1960s influenced production design adds much visual flavour to Incredibles 2 to help it stand out .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: While many modern animated films keep moving forward , it"s great that films like these go for the old - school touch .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: With the exception of their upgrade in computer graphics after 14 years , the Incredibles family are still back in action after so long .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: While it has its similarities to its predecessor

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: and not all the characters are all that great , the spirit and thematic qualities that characterized the first film still remain present , complete with the lovely family of before growing and the animation and action scenes looking better than ever .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: If you"re a fan of the first film or Pixar in general , I highly recommend viewing this worthy entertainment that packs enough thrills and character development for the whole family .

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: At the end of the day , I can officially say that I am satisfied after the 14 year wait for this film ,

title: After 14 Years, it's a Worthwhile View
review: and it will definitely remain a stand out family film like its predecessor , even if I still prefer that more .

review: This isn"t really part of the plot ,

title: The Incredible Incredibles
review: The story about a family of superheros sets it apart from the comic book films , giving us interesting family dynamics and everyday problems that all families face , which feels organic and human , allowing all of us to relate to this family

title: The Incredible Incredibles
review: and allows us to see them as not just superheros ,

title: The Incredible Incredibles
review: but ordinary families trying to live their lives .

title: The Incredible Incredibles
review: All compliments aside , the villain , Screenslaver , in this film was surprisingly weak and never much of a threat , due to a lack of opportunity for Screenslaver to truly develop itself .

title: The Incredible Incredibles
review: Unlike Syndrome in the first film , this villain never challenged the ideals and beliefs of any member of the family , although you could see where the villain is coming from , adding moral ambiguity , a characteristic of most Pixar films .

title: The Incredible Incredibles
review: In addition , so many ideas about politics , commentaries about the justice and fairness are introduced throughout the film .

title: The Incredible Incredibles
review: While relevant , it can"t help

title: The Incredible Incredibles
review: but feel over - saturated with different kinds of messages it wants to bring across .

title: The Incredible Incredibles
review: In the end , although the film was a fun and enjoyable time at the theaters , the muffled message makes the journey slightly frustrating .

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: 2016 . After a twenty - year gap , a sequel to the original " Independence Day " is finally released .

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: Audiences flock to see " Independence Day : Resurgence , " only to leave asking " 20 years ,

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: and THIS is the best they could do ? " " Incredibles 2 " was NOT as bad as that , but it tried .

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: You"d think with 14 years to work on it , they could have come up with better than this .

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: Director Brad Bird always said he wouldn"t make a sequel to his brilliant original " Incredibles " until the right script could be developed .

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: Don"t think that the release of this film means it did ; he just decided not to wait any longer .

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: A tired rehash of the original movie , albeit with new Jack - Jack antics and poop jokes thrown in , " Incredibles 2 " indulges in the already - worn - out - its - welcome Hollywood trope of " Let"s do the same thing ,

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: but this time with a WOMAN ! " It didn"t work for " Ocean"s 8 , " it didn"t work for " Estrogen Ghostbusters , "

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: and it didn"t work here .

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: There"s nothing wrong with putting Elastigirl in the action ,

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: but if her character is not developed in the process ( while simultaneously diminishing the character of Mr. Incredible ) then it"s just a pointless indulgence .

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: Combine that with an oversupply of subplots muddying things ,

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: and you end up with a movie that sorely lacks its predecessor"s inventiveness and heart , or even its fast - paced storyline .

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: Nevertheless , this movie will make tons of money , from kids who will be attracted to the flashy action sequences ( but who WILL likely squirm and whine during some excessively - long pillow talk between Bob and Helen ) and the adults who liked the first one and go to see this sequel out of nostalgia .

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: Inevitably , there will be a third in the franchise , though likely WITHOUT Bird at the helm , and even more likely without the 14 - year gap .

title: Remember how you felt after "Independence Day 2"?
review: Let"s hope it is more like the original .
